title: Richard's custom document summary schema (v1.1)
description: JSON schema for organizing summaries of a long latex document with a hierarchical structure.

response.description: The agent's self-reported acknowledgement of understanding and acceptance or rejection of the instructions.

filename.description: The name of the file being summarized.

tree.description: An itemized list of document elements, representing a hierarchical structure (tree/node/leaf).

label.description: A unique label for the document element (used with \label{}).  Cannot contain newlines.

starts_with.description: A string representing the beginning of the document element for pattern matching. Must contain at least 3 characters.

ends_with.description: A string representing the end of the document element for pattern matching. Must contain at least 3 characters.

parent.description: The label of the parent document element. Cannot contain newlines.

children.description: An array of labels for child document elements.

title.description: The title of the document element.

node_content.description: Raw extracted text of the document element, not including its children.

node_summary.description: A brief summary of the document element, not including its children.

tree_summary.description: A brief summary of the document element, including its children, recursively.

keywords.description: Keywords relevant to the document element.

comment.description: Any additional comments or notes about the document element.

status.description: The agent's self-reported success or failure in summarizing the document.
